actions.text: the virtual assistant points enthusiastically toward the shop icon while wearing a bright, welcoming smile
actions.name: point_and_smile

actions.text: the virtual assistant gestures animatedly toward the cart icon, their eyes sparkling with excitement
actions.name: gesture_cart

actions.text: the virtual assistant opens their arms wide with a warm, inviting expression, eagerly indicating the shopping section
actions.name: welcome_shopping

actions.text: the virtual assistant taps their chin thoughtfully, their face displaying curiosity as they examine the items closely
actions.name: thinking_items

actions.text: the virtual assistant raises a finger with a friendly expression, as if ready to offer helpful advice on a product
actions.name: offer_help

actions.text: the virtual assistant claps their hands together joyfully, showcasing their enthusiasm for the winter body shoe
actions.name: enthusiasm_winter_body

actions.text: the virtual assistant gives an enthusiastic thumbs up and nods approvingly at the show more options icon, radiating positivity
actions.name: thumbs_up

actions.text: the virtual assistant sweeps their hand gracefully as if inviting the user to add a new item, their expression friendly and encouraging
actions.name: invite_add_item

description: This is a webshop focused on footwear. Users can see various shoe listings along with product descriptions and prices. Interactive elements include shopping features and options to add items to the cart.
